MS MCQs

    Get introduced to the finance and operations apps

    »

    1. Which of the following business functions are managed by finance and operations apps?

      customer insights, inventory management, human resources

      supply chain management, human resources, commerce

      commerce, marketing, human resources


    2. Which finance and operations app gives you real-time visibility into warehousing and transportation business processes to reduce costs, reduce delivery time, and increase accuracy?

      Dynamics 365 Commerce

      Dynamics 365 Finance

      Dynamics 365 Supply Chain Management


    3. What do workspaces allow users to do?

      Create reports that behave like apps

      Compare multiple sources of data and have direct access to tasks

      Open entity data in Excel
